header.title: httpd_conf

erlref.modulesummary: Configuration utility functions to be used by the Erlang Web server API programmer.

description.p: This module provides the Erlang Webserver API programmer with utility functions for adding run-time configuration directives.

func.name: check_enum(EnumString, ValidEnumStrings) -> Result
func.fsummary: Check if string is a valid enumeration.

desc.p: check_enum/2 checks if EnumString is a valid enumeration of ValidEnumStrings in which case it is returned as an atom.

func.name: clean(String) -> Stripped
func.fsummary: Remove leading and/or trailing white spaces.

desc.p: clean/1 removes leading and/or trailing white spaces from String.

func.name: custom_clean(String,Before,After) -> Stripped
func.fsummary: Remove leading and/or trailing white spaces and custom characters.

desc.p: custom_clean/3 removes leading and/or trailing white spaces and custom characters from String. Before and After are regular expressions, as defined in regexp(3), describing the custom characters.

func.name: is_directory(FilePath) -> Result
func.fsummary: Check if a file path is a directory.

type.v: Reason = string() | enoent | eaccess | enotdir | FileInfo

desc.p: is_directory/1 checks if FilePath is a directory in which case it is returned. Please read file(3) for a description of enoent, eaccess and enotdir. The definition of the file info record can be found by including file.hrl from the kernel application, see file(3).

func.name: is_file(FilePath) -> Result
func.fsummary: Check if a file path is a regular file.

type.v: Reason = string() | enoent | eaccess | enotdir | FileInfo

desc.p: is_file/1 checks if FilePath is a regular file in which case it is returned. Read file(3) for a description of enoent, eaccess and enotdir. The definition of the file info record can be found by including file.hrl from the kernel application, see file(3).

func.name: make_integer(String) -> Result
func.fsummary: Return an integer representation of a string.

desc.p: make_integer/1 returns an integer representation of String.
